projects.title: Classroom Management

projects.title: Fuzzy Typers

projects.title: Password Security Check
projects.description: Determine passwords strength through researched algorithms including common weaknesses such as guessable patterns, including sequential or repetitive characters, common names or phrases, and dictionary words. Written in Java.
